title: Gwirio os yw cerbyd wedi'i drethu
description: Gwirio a rhoi gwybod os oes gan gerbyd dreth cerbyd cyfoes neu wedi cael ei ddatgan yn HOS (‘oddi ar y ffordd’)

meets_user_needs.title: As a car driver or purchaser, I need to check the MOT status or history, tax status, or registration of a car, so that so that I can check the seller's claims and decide about buying it or assess my car's performance (100260)

details.benefit: so that I can check the seller's claims and decide about buying it or assess my car's performance
details.goal: check the MOT status or history, tax status, or registration of a car
details.impact: Has consequences for the majority of your users
justifications: It's something the government provides/does/pays for
met_when: the user can check the current status of the vehicle's MOT

ordered_related_items.description: Welsh/Cymraeg: Rhaid i chi drethu eich cerbyd a dangos disg treth – gallwch weld sut mae gwneud hyn ar-lein, dros y ffôn neu yn Swyddfa’r Post
ordered_related_items.title: Trethu eich cerbyd

ordered_related_items.description: Cofrestru eich cerbyd oddi ar y ffordd os ydych yn ei gadw mewn garej, ar ddreif neu ar dir preifat – ni fydd angen i chi dalu treth cerbyd hyd nes i chi ei roi ar y ffordd eto
ordered_related_items.title: Cofrestru eich cerbyd fel oddi ar y ffordd (HOS)

ordered_related_items.description: Welsh/Cymraeg: Dysgwch pa gerbydau sydd wedi’u heithrio o dreth cerbyd (treth car) a sut y bydd yn dal angen i chi ddangos disg treth efallai
ordered_related_items.title: Cerbydau sydd wedi'u heithrio o dreth cerbyd

available_translations.title: Gwirio os yw cerbyd wedi'i drethu
available_translations.description: Gwirio a rhoi gwybod os oes gan gerbyd dreth cerbyd cyfoes neu wedi cael ei ddatgan yn HOS (‘oddi ar y ffordd’)
